original_title: おしっこ解禁！初めての恥じらいおもらし
overview: Neat and clean former local station announcer Aika Yamagishi has lifted the ban on pissing! Challenge the first peeing! I can't stand the director's extended interview and I pee while my face is bright red! It's embarrassing, but it's peeing sex, peeing in a sweatshirt, sexa size, pee-covered 3P with toys! As a bonus, all pees taken on the day of shooting are recorded as off-shot peeing! "It's been since I was in kindergarten that I've peeed in public..."
title: Forbidden To Piss! Your First Shameful Experience Wetting Yourself Aika Yamagishi
